ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will guide them and better their condition
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will show them the way, and better their state,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He will guide them and set their condition right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God will lead them to everlasting happiness and improve their condition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will soon guide them (towards Paradise) and make them succeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will guide them and amend their condition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He will guide them and improve their condition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He will guide them, and dispose their minds aright,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will guide them and improve their state,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He will guide them and improve their condition;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Anon He shall guide them, and shall make good their state.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will guide them and set right their affairs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Soon will He guide them and improve their condition,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will guide them and set right their state.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He will guide them and repair their condition;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will guide them, and will improve their state of mind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will guide them and amend their condition
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [47:5] He will guide them, in this world and in the Hereafter to what benefits them, and rightly dispose their minds, their condition in both, with that [guidance and disposal] in this world being for those who were not slain,   but who have been included in [the statement] ‘and those who were slain’ (qutilū) because of [the] predominance therein [of those who were slain].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will guide them) He will give them success to perform righteous deeds (and improve their state) and improve their condition and intention; it is also said that this means: He will save them in the Hereafter and improve their state and accept their works on the Day of Judgement,
